availableToLend().details: Return the amount of lending token available for loans. This is the total balance of all lending tokens controlled by this contact.

collateralNeeded(uint256).details: Calculate the amount of collateral reauired for the desired loan amount. Calculations rounds up.

getCurrentCollateralPrice().details: Helper to return the current configured collateral price

isActiveLoan(address).details: Return true if the 'borrower' has an outstanding loan balance. An outstanding loan is when the 'borrowed' value is > 0

liquidateLoan(address).details: liquidate a loan.  A loan can only be liquidated if the collateral is not sufficient to cover the loan.  This can happen when the price of collateral fluctuates.  Anyone can repay (liquidate) the loan and receive the corresponding collateral. Approval needed: aderyn-ignore-next-line(state-change-without-event)

loanInformation(address).details: Return information about a current loan for the given borrower.

repayLoan(uint256).details: repay the loan.  This only allows paying the entire loan back. So `amount` must be at least the borrowed amount Approval needed Owner need to approve this contract for transfer aderyn-ignore-next-line(state-change-without-event)

supplyCollateral(uint256).details: Supply the token collateral. Approval needed The supplier should have previously approved this contract to transfer ERC20 collateral token their behalf. aderyn-ignore-next-line(state-change-without-event)

supplyLendingToken(uint256).details: Add lending token for loans. NOTE: This is designed for modeling and simulation. Lenders are not rewarded and cannot withdraw lending tokens. Approval Needed This contract is the 'holder' of funds during the lending process. The 'msg.sender' should have previously approved this contract to transfer ERC20 on their behalf.

withdrawCollateral().details: Withdraw any collateral and return to owner. You can only withdraw collateral if there's no outstanding borrowed funds. aderyn-ignore-next-line(state-change-without-event)
